name: Very Spooky Adventure
description:
You've come across an invitation to the spookiest Halloween party of the year! Noice!!

Just one problem - it's a party for monsters only, and they won't let any humans in... unless they can collect enough candy!

Note: You can change sensitivity and graphics settings in the pause menu by pressing P

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look/Interact
P - Pause

Music: "The Path of the Goblin King v2" and "Stringed Disco" by Kevin Macleod - incompitech.com

Happy Halloween!!!
